mapper.select: SELECT a.user_role_id as userRoleId, b. NAME as userRoleName, b.platform as platformName, b.server_id as serverId, max(a.log_update_time) as lastTime, sum(a.decr_value) as num, (select data from role_rank_data where user_role_id = a.user_role_id) as data FROM role_dece_account a, user_role b WHERE a.user_role_id = b.id AND a.log_update_time >= #{startTime} AND a.log_update_time <= #{finishTime} group by a.user_role_id having num >= #{yaoqiu} order by num desc LIMIT 100
